title: RentPayment - by PPS™
description:
Pay rent. Your way.
We get it. Parting with a big chunk of change on the first of the month is tough. Our job is to make it as easy and convenient as possible. So, our best engineers spent countless hours building what we consider the best mobile app available to pay rent.
With the all new RentPayment mobile app, you can pay your rent online and on time every month.
•  Say “no” to paper checks.
•  Say “no” to stamps and envelopes.
•  Say “no” to last minute trips to the property drop box.
•  Say “no” to late fees.
•  Say “no” to hassle and anxiety.
RentPayment gives you the ability to pay rent using a credit card, debit card or eCheck. Finally, the choice is yours.
Paying your rent couldn’t be easier.
1.  Sign up
2.  Search for your property
3.  Select your payment method
4.  Pay rent
Voila! You just earned 30 more days in your humble abode. Congratulations.
When you pay your rent with RentPayment, you can sleep well knowing that we have your back when it comes to customer service and protecting your personal payment information. Our California-based call center is available 365 a days a year and our payment platform is rated Level One PCI compliant (which means you can trust our app).
What You Can Do:
•  Pay rent with your preferred payment option – credit card, debit card or eCheck. RentPayment supports all major credit cards - Visa, MasterCard, Amex, and Discover.
•  Pay rent quickly and easily and avoid late fees
•  Manage your RentPayment account
•  Setup push notifications
•  Receive confirmation of your monthly rent payment
•  Integrate seamlessly with your property*
*IMPORTANT NOTE:
•  Your property must offer RentPayment in order to pay rent with this mobile app.
•  We may collect technical information about your computer, including for example, where available, your IP address, IMEI, operating system, and browser type, for system administration and to report aggregate information to our Partners. This is aggregate statistical data about our users’ browsing actions and patterns.
Download the new RentPayment App!
Learn more at RentPayment.com
Follow us on Facebook for promotions and product updates!

With the all new RentPayment mobile app, you can pay your rent online and on time every month.

• Say “no” to stamps and envelopes.
• Say “no” to last minute trips to the property drop box.
• Say “no” to late fees.
• Say “no” to hassle and anxiety.

RentPayment gives you the ability to pay rent using a credit card, debit card or eCheck. Finally, the choice is yours.

Paying your rent couldn’t be easier.
1. Sign up
2. Search for your property
3. Select your payment method
4. Pay rent

Voila! You just earned 30 more days in your humble abode. Congratulations.

When you pay your rent with RentPayment, you can sleep well knowing that we have your back when it comes to customer service and protecting your personal payment information. Our California-based call center is available 365 a days a year and our payment platform is rated Level One PCI compliant (which means you can trust our app).

• Pay rent with your preferred payment option – credit card, debit card or eCheck. RentPayment supports all major credit cards - Visa, MasterCard, Amex, and Discover.

• Setup push notifications
• Receive confirmation of your monthly rent payment

This is aggregate statistical data about our users’ browsing actions and patterns.

Download the new RentPayment App!
Learn more at RentPayment.com
Follow us on Facebook for promotions and product updates!
